## ThirdwebSDK.getEdition() method

Get an instance of an Edition contract

**Signature:**

```typescript
getEdition(address: string): Edition;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | the address of the deployed contract |

**Returns:**

[Edition](./sdk.edition.md)

the contract
